```{r housekeeping, include=FALSE}
rm(list=ls()) # clear environment
library("taxizedb") # load packages
```

```{r get_LocalTaxonomyDatabase, include=FALSE}
db_tax_NCBI <- db_download_ncbi(verbose = TRUE, overwrite = FALSE) #download the NCBI taxonomy database
```

```{r get_Orders, include=FALSE}
orders_NCBI_metazoans_ls <- downstream("Metazoa", db = "ncbi", downto = "order") #get all order names in Domain Eukarya, note- output is a list
orders_NCBI_metazoans_df <- as.data.frame(orders_NCBI_metazoans_ls[1]) #format from list to data frame
```

```{r get_OrderTaxonomies, include=FALSE}
taxonomy_of_orders_cls <- taxizedb::classification(orders_NCBI_metazoans_df[,1], db="ncbi") #get full taxonomies for each order, note - output is a list-like "classification" object that sucks
taxonomy_of_orders_df <- data.frame(matrix(ncol=6, nrow=length(taxonomy_of_orders_cls))) # empty dataframe
colnames(taxonomy_of_orders_df) <- c("full_branch","superkingdom","kingdom","phylum","class","order") #add column names to the empty dataframe

#loop through the classification object to populate the empty data.frame
for (i in 1:length(taxonomy_of_orders_cls)) {
  x <- as.data.frame(taxonomy_of_orders_cls[i])
  c1 <- paste0(x[,1], collapse=";")
  c2 <- paste0(x[which(x[,2]=="superkingdom"),c(1,3)], collapse="_")
  c3 <- paste0(x[which(x[,2]=="kingdom"),c(1,3)], collapse="_")
  c4 <- paste0(x[which(x[,2]=="phylum"),c(1,3)], collapse="_")
  c5 <- paste0(x[which(x[,2]=="class"),c(1,3)], collapse="_")
  c6 <- paste0(x[which(x[,2]=="order"),c(1,3)], collapse="_")
  
  if (length(c1) > 0) {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$full_branch[i] <- c1
  } else {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$full_branch[i] <- "na"    
  }
  
  if (length(c2) > 0) {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$superkingdom[i] <- c2
  } else {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$superkingdom[i] <- "na"    
  }
  
  if (length(c3) > 0) {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$kingdom[i] <- c3
  } else {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$kingdom[i] <- "na"    
  }
  
  if (length(c4) > 0) {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$phylum[i] <- c4
  } else {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$phylum[i] <- "na"    
  }
  
  if (length(c5) > 0) {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$class[i] <- c5
  } else {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$class[i] <- "na"    
  }
  
  if (length(c6) > 0) {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$order[i] <- c6
  } else {
    taxonomy_of_orders_df$order[i] <- "na"    
  }
  
  
 rm(list = c("c1","c2","c3","c4","c5","c6","x"))
}
write.csv(taxonomy_of_orders_df, "MetazoanOrders_NCBI_2023-10-17.csv")
```

```{r get_MetazoanSpeciesByOrder, include=FALSE}

species_by_MetazoanOrder <- taxonomy_of_orders_df
for (i in 1:dim(species_by_MetazoanOrder)[1]){
  id <- strsplit(species_by_MetazoanOrder$order[i], "_")[[1]][2] #get the iud number for each order
  spp_list <- downstream(id, db="ncbi", downto="species")
  spp_df <- as.data.frame(spp_list[1])
  species_by_MetazoanOrder$spp_list[i] <- paste0(spp_df[,1], collapse=";") #update database
  rm(id); rm(spp_list); rm(spp_df) #clean up
}

write.csv(species_by_MetazoanOrder, "MetazoaSpeciesByOrder_2023-09-19.csv", row.names = F)

```
